column3: This straight-arrow sutler is struggling to convince the Resistance fighters.
Use the blowgun to shoot the targets at the designated location.
Could you lend me a hand?
I rushed here after hearing that Rhalgr's Reach had been attacked by the Empire, bringing all the goods I could carry with me.
One of the weapons I brought was a blowgun. I think it a fairly useful tool, but none of the Resistance fighters seem to agree. Could you help me show them all how handy it can be?
I know it will serve them well in their fight. They simply do not realize it yet. Please meet me by the targets I have set up.
Do you seriously think we can fight the Empire with a children's toy?
I have prepared four targets for you. Hit them all to show how splendid a weapon the blowgun is. Make sure to first choose your target before blowing with all your might.
Do you seriously think we can fight the Empire with a children's toy?
I have prepared four targets for you. Hit them all to show how splendid a weapon the blowgun is. Make sure to first choose your target before blowing with all your might.
Absolute perfection! The Resistance fighters were transfixed by your display.
If one is able to get close enough to an enemy, they could use the blowgun to shoot a poison dart right into their neck. It really can be quite handy in the right situation.
I got the idea from an Ala Mhigan I met in the Black Shroud. He said he'd seen some locals hunting with it and wondered if the Resistance couldn't find a use for it.
It just goes to show you don't need to pick up a sword to fight against the Empire. We all have our own parts to play.
Yes, I can already imagine how blowguns could help us when ambushing imperial soldiers.
